effect.x_y: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.

short_effect.x_y: Negates held items for five turns.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Negates held items for five turns.

flavor_text.x_y: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns.
